messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] quilting posts
messages.msgSnippet: Hello,  I am not a quilted, but I am enjoying the posts, I find it inspiring to hear how others are inspired. It only seems natural that an endless amount of
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
 I am not a quilted, but I am enjoying the posts, I
find it inspiring to hear how others are inspired. It
only seems natural that an endless amount of interests
show up on this site. If you quilting enthusiasts would
not have shared, I would not have thought about
quilting; the beauty, the art, the comfort, the people
that I have known who are or were quitters. 
Wendy wew99@... 

Long and involved emails about the fun and stimulation
of emailing wouldn't go down so well, though I suppose
*grin*

Tracy

messages.subject: quilting posts
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I am not a quilted, but I am enjoying the posts, I find it inspiring to hear how others are inspired. It only seems natural that an endless amount of
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
I am not a quilted, but I am enjoying the posts, I find it inspiring to hear how others are inspired. It only seems natural that an endless amount of interests show up on this site. If you quilting enthusiasts would not have shared, I would not have thought about quilting; the beauty, the art, the comfort, the people that I have known who are or were quitters.
Wendy wew99@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
